p.s: He is a good working, good earning man.

He claims that unions are no longer caring about better working conditions for employees, because everything is already legislated.
Furthermore he says that unions are obstructing the companies.
At the end he says that the the current relatively of unions and employers are not good for business environment.
First of all I have to say that unions are needed.
In all countryscountries in the world.
That working rights are legislated is a privilegprivilege.
But this is not everywhere and also not making the unions useless.
They are still manditorymandatory for workers in all kinds of working issues.
Then the power relatively is not unhealthy it is balanced.
